src:
Tempat Pendaftaran Pre-Order Huawei Mate 30 Pro di Indonesia
04 Nov 2019, 03:47 by Mansur
Daftar Pre-order Huawei Mate 30 Pro Sekarang dan Dapetin Hadiahnya Nanti
Oketekno – Seperti yang sudah dipastikan sebelumnya, dimana Huawei Mate 30 Pro bakalan datang ke Indonesia. Dan semakin dekatnya dengan waktu perilisan, kini para konsumen yang ingin mendapatkan Smartphone ini, sekarang sudah mulai bisa melakukan pendaftaran pemesanan untuk dapetin ponsel Premium terbaru dari Huawei tersebut.
Huawei telah membuka pendaftaran untuk melakukan pemesanan terhadap Mate 30 Pro ini sejak 2 hari yang lalu, lebih tepatnya sejak tanggal 2 November 2019 kemarin. Nama Program ini yakni Registration of Interest atau disingkat ROI. Masa pendaftaran yang dibuka sendiri tidaklah sebentar, yaitu berlangsung hingga tanggal 14 November 2019 mendatang. Bagi kalian yang berminat, bisa langsung Copy-Paste link di bagian paling bawah.

Simak Nih: 

Rilis Tahun Depan, Penerus Mate X Pakai Chip Paling Baru dari Huawei


Setelah masa registrasi ini, nantinya akan dibuka lagi masa Pre-order yang akan berlangsung selama sepekan. Lebih tepatnya, konsumen bisa memesan produk ini mulai tanggal 15 – 22 November 2019 mendatang. Dan pastinya, mereka yang sudah melakukan registrasi sebelumnya akan mendapatkan beberapa bonus menarik.


Copyright ©Huawei

Kemudian untuk setiap pelanggan Huawei Mate 30 Pro nantinya juga akan mendapatkan jaminan garansi tambahan selama 1 tahun, termasuk pelayanan 24 jam, dan asuransi layar selama 3 bulan. Lalu, dalam masa Pre-order nantinya setiap konsumen juga berkesempatan mendapatkan Huawei Freelace dan Casing ponsel.

Ketahui Yuk: 

Ada Varian Baru Huawei P30 di Indonesia, Segini Harganya!


Sedikit tentang kemampuan Mate 30 Pro, ponsel tersebut menjadi yang tercepat di kelas ponsel Huawei sekarang, sebab sudah dipacu chip Kirin 990. Kemudian ada juga baterai 4.500 mAh yang sudah didukung oleh teknologi pengisian daya super cepat 40W.
“Huawei Mate 30 Pro adalah untuk mereka yang special yang menghargai teknologi, yang menginspirasi dan terinspirasi oleh inovasi, dan yang siap untuk menghadapi hal-hal di luar kemungkinan,” seperti itulah kata Lo Khing Seng selaku Deputy Country Director, Huawei Consumer Business Group, sebagaimana dilansir dari detikINET, Senin (4/11/2019).
Masalah harga Huawei Mate 30 Pro di Indonesia, masih belum disebutkan secara gamblang. Yang pasti, ponsel ini bakal ditawarkan dengan harga belasan juta. Lebih pastinya, bisa nantikan perilisannya pekan depan.
Link Daftar: https://consumer.huawei.com/id/campaign/mate-30-pro-register/
baca juga: Turun Rp 1.4 Juta, Segini Harga Huawei Nova 5T Sekarang di Indonesia
text:
Place to Pre-Order Huawei Mate 30 Pro in Indonesia
Nov 04 2019, 03:47 by Mansur
Register Pre-order Huawei Mate 30 Pro Now and Get the Prizes Later
Oketekno - As has been confirmed previously, where Huawei Mate 30 Pro will come to Indonesia. And getting closer to the release time, now consumers who want to get this smartphone, now have begun to register orders for the latest premium mobile phones from Huawei.
Huawei has opened registration to place an order for Mate 30 Pro since 2 days ago, more precisely since 2 November 2019 yesterday. The name of this program is Registration of Interest or abbreviated ROI. The registration period that opens itself is not short, which lasts until the 14th November 2019. For those of you who are interested, you can directly Copy-Paste the link at the very bottom.

Listen Here:

Released Next Year, Successor to Mate X Use the Most New Chip from Huawei


After this registration period, a Pre-order period which will last for a week will be opened again. More precisely, consumers can order these products from November 15-22, 2019. And of course, those who have already registered before will get some attractive bonuses.


Copyright © Huawei

Then for every Huawei Mate 30 Pro customer, they will also get an additional 1-year warranty guarantee, including 24-hour service, and screen insurance for 3 months. Then, in the Pre-order period, each consumer will also have the opportunity to get a Huawei Freelace and cell phone case.

Let's Know:

There is a New Variant of Huawei P30 in Indonesia, at this Price!


A little about the ability of Mate 30 Pro, the cell phone is the fastest in the Huawei cellphone class now, because it has been driven by the Kirin 990 chip. Then there is also a 4,500 mAh battery that is already supported by 40W super fast charging technology.
"Huawei Mate 30 Pro is for those who are special who value technology, who inspire and are inspired by innovation, and who are ready to deal with things out of possibility," as said Lo Khing Seng as Deputy Country Director, Huawei Consumer Business Group, as reported by detikINET, Monday (11/04/2019).
The issue of the price of the Huawei Mate 30 Pro in Indonesia, is still not clearly stated. To be sure, this phone will be offered at a price of tens of millions. More certainly, we can look forward to the release next week.
Register Link: https://consumer.huawei.com/en/campaign/mate-30-pro-register/
Also read: Down to IDR 1.4 Million, As of this Price of the Huawei Nova 5T Now in Indonesia
